attributes.action: Hire DOGE to do a government audit.
attributes.additional_details: It is time for transparency. It's not about blame, it just needs to be sorted out. If not now then when?
attributes.background: We've been told that there is a "black hole" in the government budget. Since this has been acknowledged, please do an audit to find out where our tax money is going.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for a similar action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/701630
